p: It is documented that the ethanol extract of M. officinalis prevents memory deficit in an animal model of AD ( 190). Evidence indicates that ethanol extract of this medicinal herb reduces the level and activity of AChE in the cortex and hippocampus of mice treated with scopolamine ( 192). Table 1 summarizes the biochemical, histopathological, and behavioral effects of the herbal medicines in in vivo and in vitro studies.
